Export.Routine: MIF901RU01(mi) ; ML 1/2/00 ; OLYMPUS AU400 (Bi-Directional) (Russion BION) s mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q k ^TMIF(mi,10) s $zt="err^MIF000" i $$select^LVBMIMP(mi) q f j=1:1:PLIST s @("par"_j)=PLIST(j) s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),ack=$c(6),nak=$c(15),etb=$c(23) s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" i $$start^MIF000() q d trace^MIF000(mi,"Started job="_$j,"DEBUG") f d Main i $$stop^MIF000() q c par4 d trace^MIF000(mi,"Stopped job="_$j,"DEBUG") q Main N mainrecord,nrecord,nn s mainrecord=$$read^MIF000(stx,etb_","_etx) q:'$l(mainrecord) d trace^MIF000(mi,mainrecord,"H<--M") d ACK Set nrecord=$L(mainrecord,stx) For nn=1:1:nrecord { Set record=$P(mainrecord,stx,nn) If '$Length(record) Continue Do SubMain } Q SubMain ; process host query i $e(record,1,2)="R " d q .k ^TMIF(mi,10) . ; create order to send to instrument .s str="S "_$e(record,3,25)_" E" . Set containernumber=+$e(record,14,25) . Set epis=$$Episode4Container^KSMIF000(containernumber) . If epis="" Quit .s tg="" s sampid=$e(record,12),samptype=$e(record,9) .i sampid="0",samptype=" " s tg=sampid .i sampid="E" s tg=sampid .i samptype="U" s tg=samptype .d scanone^MIF000(mi,epis,"") .s (tc,tcx)="" i $d(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis)) d k ^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis) ..Set i="" ..For Set i=$Order(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis,i)) Quit:i="" Do ... If (epis'=containernumber)&&('$$IsTestCode4Container^KSMIF000(containernumber,mi,i,samptype)) Quit ... Set tc=i ... If $Extract(tc,$Length(tc))="U" Set tc=$Extract(tc,1,$Length(tc)-1) ... If $Extract(tc,$Length(tc))="Z" Set tc=$Extract(tc,1,$Length(tc)-1) ... Set tcx=tcx_tc .s str=str_tcx s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)=str .i $d(^TMIF(mi,10)) d SEND k ^TMIF(mi,10) ; process result record i $e(record,1,2)="D "!($e(record,1,2)="d ")!($e(record,1,2)="DQ")!($e(record,1,2)="DH")!($e(record,1,2)="dH") d q .f i=1:1:$l(record,etb) s rec=$p(record,etb,i) d ..q:rec="" s:$e(rec)=$c(2) rec=$p(rec,stx,2) ..s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" ..Set containernumber=+$Translate($Extract(rec,14,25)," ") ..Set epis=$$Episode4Container^KSMIF000(containernumber) ..S samptype=$e(rec,9),xrec=$e(rec,31,999) ; 12 digit epis ..f s res=$e(xrec,1,14) d q:$l(xrec)<14 ...s xrec=$e(xrec,15,999) ...Set samptype=$Select(samptype="U":"U",1:"") ...If epis'=containernumber Do .... Set conttype=$$ContainerType4Container^KSMIF000(epis,containernumber) .... If conttype="T051" Set samptype="Z" ; Глюкоза с нагрузкой... ...s x1=$tr($e(res,1,3)," ")_samptype,x2=$tr($e(res,4,12)," "),x3=$tr($e(res,13,14)," ") ... ; strip flags ...s x3=$tr(x3,"1234567FGHLNPrpx","") ...s result=result_x1_$c(par10)_x2_$c(par10)_x3_$c(par11) .. ; extract QC details ..i $e(record,1,2)="DQ" .i $l(epis),$l(result) d file^MIF000(mi,sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC) q ; send 'ack' to instrument ACK w ack,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H-->M") q ; send string to instrument SEND H 1 ; Olympus need little delay to be read recieve orders s x="" f s x=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,x)) q:x="" d .s str=^(x) f i=1:1:2 d q:ok ..s ok="" ..w stx,str,etx,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,str,"H-->M") ..r *a:5 d trace^MIF000(mi,$s($c(a)=ack:"ACK",$c(a)=nak:"NAK",1:$c(a)),"H<--M") ..i $c(a)=ack s ok=1 q
